ing"),[(1,"of")]),(("Amiss","rising"),[(1,"financial")]),(("Amiss","role"),[(2,"in")]),(("Amiss","sadistic"),[(1,"treatment")]),(("Amiss","sadistically"),[(1,"cohering")]),(("Amiss","satire"),[(1,"of"),(2,"(and")]),(("Amiss","satirical"),[(1,"embrace"),(2,"allegory")]),(("Amiss","satirically"),[(1,"disdainful")]),(("Amiss","self-effacing"),[(1,"authorial")]),(("Amiss","self-referential"),[(1,"borrowing")]),(("Amiss","self-reflexive"),[(1,"style"),(2,"metafictional"),(2,"complicity,")]),(("Amiss","strict"),[(1,"narrative")]),(("Amiss","stylistic"),[(1,"orchestration"),(2,"affectations,")]),(("Amiss","surrogate"),[(1,"begins"),(2,"author")]),(("Amiss","treatment"),[(1,"of")]),(("Amiss","typological"),[(1,"naming")]),(("Amiss","unfolding"),[(1,"story")]),(("Amiss","victory"),[(1,"in")]),(("Amiss","work"),[(1,"yields"),(2,"as")]),(("Amiss","work:"),[(1,"the")]),(("Amiswho","figures"),[(1,"as")]),(("Among","many"),[(1,"remarkable")]),(("An","Arab"),[(1,"hikes")]),(("And","Martina"),[(1,"Twain,")]),(("And","as"),[(1,"many")]),(("And","can"),[(1,"the")]),(("And","from"),[(1,"then")]),(("And","if"),[(1,"politeness")]),(("And","in"),[(1,"this"),(2,"fact,")]),(("And","it"),[(1,"is")]),(("And","its"),[(1,"during")]),(("And","perhaps"),[(1,"most")]),(("And","since,"),[(1,"as")]),(("And","there"),[(1,"is")]),(("And","transitory."),[(1,"Above")]),(("And","what"),[(1,"disturbs")]),(("And","when"),[(1,"the")]),(("And","whence"),[(1,"her")]),(("And","who"),[(1,"is")]),(("And","yet"),[(1,"the"),(2,"such")]),(("And","yet,"),[(1,"while"),(2,"in"),(2,"despite"),(2,"being")]),(("And","yet."),[(1,"If")]),(("Andrew","Wylie"),[(1,"to")]),(("Animal","Farm,"),[(1,"perhaps")]),(("Answers","(Begley"),[(1,"98).")]),(("Aplanalp","(having"),[(1,"controversially")]),(("Aplanalp,","that"),[(1,"the")]),(("April","is"),[(2,"the")]),(("Arab","hikes"),[(1,"his")]),(("Archive","Foundation"),[(3,"Berlin.")]),(("Arguably","more"),[(1,"theoretically")]),(("Art","can"),[(1,"highlight")]),(("Art,","that"),[(1 ley","argues"),[(1,"of")]),(("Begleys","observation"),[(1,"of")]),(("Begleys","sense"),[(1,"that")]),(("Being","publicly"),[(1,"and")]),(("Benefitting","from"),[(1,"corporate")]),(("Berger","argues,"),[(1,"that")]),(("Berger","describes"),[(1,"white")]),(("Berger,","defines"),[(1,"as")]),(("Berlin.","Used"),[(3,"by")]),(("Bernards","argument"),[(1,"that")]),(("Bertelsmann","and"),[(1,"Time")]),(("Bildung,","but"),[(1,"also")]),(("Black","Folk:"),[(1,"from")]),(("Black","visibility"),[(1,"already")]),(("Blackness","becomes,"),[(1,"as")]),(("Blackness","disturbs"),[(1,"and")]),(("Blackness","is"),[(1,"consequently")]),(("Blastfurters,","and"),[(1,"an")]),(("Blendwerk","is"),[(1,"inevitable")]),(("Bnyeis","argument"),[(1,"that")]),(("Bohemian","trappings"),[(1,"of")]),(("Bois","1-2)2"),[(1,"Here")]),(("Bois","did"),[(1,"in")]),(("Bois","insists"),[(1,"on")]),(("Bois)","racism"),[(1,"is")]),(("Bois,","Piper"),[(1,"wants")]),(("Bois,","and"),[(1,"at")]),(("Boiss","Souls."),[(1,"For")]),(("Boiss","calling"),[(1,"card")]),(("Boiss","formulation:"),[(1,"racism")]),(("Boiss","metaphor"),[(1,"of")]),(("Boiss","notion"),[(1,"of")]),(("Boiss","story"),[(1,"about")]),(("BoissThe","Souls"),[(1,"of")]),(("Book","Agreement"),[(1,"in")]),(("Borrowing","from"),[(1,"Foucaults")]),(("Both","are"),[(1,"governed")]),(("Bourdieu","has"),[(1,"been")]),(("Bourdieus","model"),[(1,"of")]),(("Bourdieus","thesis"),[(1,"in")]),(("Brantlinger","puts"),[(1,"it")]),(("Bretton","Woods"),[(1,"agreement")]),(("Briefly,","Gregory"),[(1,"gradually")]),(("Britain","in"),[(1,"the")]),(("Britain,","as"),[(1,"Patrick")]),(("Britains","changing"),[(1,"political")]),(("British","banking"),[(1,"and")]),(("British","economics"),[(1,"in")]),(("British","fiction."),[(1,"And")]),(("British","publishing"),[(1,"establishment")]),(("British","society"),[(1,"leading")]),(("Broadway","who"),[(1,"repeatedly")]),(("Broadway,","for"),[(1,"all")]),(("Brouillette","argues"),[(1,"that,")]),(("Brouillette","has"),[(1,"shown") ing"),[(1,"back")]),(("By","establishing"),[(1,"a")]),(("By","making"),[(1,"the")]),(("By","reason"),[(1,"of")]),(("By","seeing"),[(1,"people")]),(("By","substituting"),[(1,"etiquette")]),(("By","this,"),[(1,"I")]),(("Calling","(Card)"),[(1,"#1")]),(("Calling","(Cards)"),[(1,"presents"),(2,"operates"),(3,"makes"),(2,"itself"),(2,"interestingly"),(2,"has"),(2,"effectively"),(2,"can"),(2,"becomes"),(2,"asks"),(3,"as"),(4,"and"),(2,"#1,"),(2,"#1")]),(("Calling","(Cards),"),[(1,"the"),(2,"or"),(2,"becomes"),(2,"and"),(2,"affectivity")]),(("Calling","(Cards)."),[(1,"In"),(2,"A")]),(("Calling","(Cards):"),[(1,"devoid")]),(("Can","I,"),[(1,"as")]),(("Can","one"),[(1,"return")]),(("Cape,","an"),[(1,"imprint")]),(("Carburton,","Linex"),[(1,"&")]),(("Card","#1"),[(1,"makes")]),(("Carlyles","rantings?),"),[(1,"and")]),(("Catherine","Bernards"),[(1,"argument")]),(("Celebrities","In"),[(1,"his")]),(("Central","to"),[(1,"this"),(2,"Pipers")]),(("Certainly.","As"),[(1,"Delany")]),(("Chaplin","produce,"),[(1,"in")]),(("Charybdis,","the"),[(1,"episode")]),(("Cheselden","has"),[(1,"given")]),(("Cheselden","tells"),[(1,"us,")]),(("Cheselden.","The"),[(1,"original")]),(("Clearly","people"),[(1,"arent")]),(("Clerk","(i.e.,"),[(1,"for")]),(("Coach","kills."),[(1,"Its")]),(("Cocktail","Parties),"),[(1,"1986-1990.")]),(("Cognitive","Terror"),[(1,"Mr.")]),(("Collection","Davis"),[(1,"Museum")]),(("Collection","Thomas"),[(1,"Erben.")]),(("Collection","of"),[(1,"Eileen")]),(("College.","Adrian"),[(1,"Piper")]),(("Collins","and"),[(1,"reflect")]),(("Collins,","and"),[(1,"initiated")]),(("Conclusion","I"),[(1,"began")]),(("Consider","two"),[(1,"examples.")]),(("Contrary","to"),[(1,"the")]),(("Critique","93-94)."),[(1,"The")]),(("Critique","as"),[(1,"separate")]),(("Critique","in"),[(1,"her")]),(("Critique","is"),[(1,"the"),(2,"so"),(2,"experienced"),(2,"at")]),(("Critique","of"),[(1,"Pure")]),(("Critique","that"),[(1,"poses")]),(("Critique","was"),[(1,"a")]),(("Critique,","where"),[(1,"the")]), rian")]),(("Finally,","as"),[(1,"a")]),(("Finally,","in"),[(1,"this")]),(("Finally,","the"),[(1,"dissociative")]),(("Finding","Success"),[(1,"Readers")]),(("First,","Amis"),[(1,"addresses")]),(("First,","I"),[(1,"show"),(2,"define")]),(("First,","in"),[(1,"a")]),(("First,","the"),[(1,"voices"),(2,"scandal")]),(("Five","to"),[(1,"six:")]),(("Fly","in"),[(1,"the")]),(("Focusing","on"),[(1,"modernisms")]),(("Folk:","from"),[(1,"shared")]),(("Following","Gwyns"),[(1,"return")]),(("Following","Kant,"),[(1,"Piper")]),(("Following","Tams"),[(1,"Bnyeis")]),(("Following","on"),[(1,"this,")]),(("Following","this"),[(1,"coy")]),(("Food","for"),[(13,"the")]),(("For","Burke,"),[(2,"the")]),(("For","Jaffe,"),[(1,"building")]),(("For","Piper"),[(1,"(and")]),(("For","Self,"),[(1,"an")]),(("For","a"),[(1,"long")]),(("For","as"),[(1,"Burke")]),(("For","example,"),[(1,"simultaneously"),(2,"Richards")]),(("For","if"),[(2,"you"),(2,"the"),(2,"one")]),(("For","in"),[(1,"this")]),(("For","instance,"),[(1,"one")]),(("For","me,"),[(1,"that")]),(("For","one,"),[(1,"Johns")]),(("For","she"),[(1,"goes")]),(("For","some"),[(1,"ambiguous")]),(("For","the"),[(1,"photographs"),(2,"interior"),(2,"aim")]),(("For","this"),[(1,"intransitive")]),(("For","what"),[(1,"is")]),(("For","white"),[(1,"custom")]),(("Foucaults","theory"),[(1,"of")]),(("Foundation","Berlin."),[(3,"Used")]),(("Four","to"),[(1,"five,")]),(("Frankfurt","School"),[(1,"immanent")]),(("French","tiquette,"),[(1,"meaning")]),(("From","another"),[(1,"point")]),(("From","the"),[(1,"withdrawal"),(2,"self-reflexive")]),(("Frow","48)."),[(1,"As")]),(("Frow","55)."),[(1,"As")]),(("Fuller","shortly"),[(1,"after")]),(("Further,","Richards"),[(1,"attempts")]),(("Further,","both"),[(1,"the")]),(("Further,","this"),[(1,"shift")]),(("Further,","we"),[(1,"might")]),(("Furthermore,","Burke"),[(1,"concludes,")]),(("Furthermore,","it"),[(1,"is")]),(("Gal","Aplanalp"),[(1,"(having")]),(("Gal","Aplanalp,"),[(1,"that")]),(("Gal","plays"),[(1,"a")]),(("Gal","quickly"),[(1,"shifts")]),(("Gal","tells"),[(1,"Richard")]),(("Gals","list"),[(1,"is")]),(("Gaze,","is"),[(1,"the")]),(("Gemeinsinn","or"),[(1,"sensus")]),(("Georgian","town"),[(1,"house")]),(("German.","And"),[(1,"from")]),(("Given","that"),[(1,"My")]),(("Goldman","argues"),[(1,"that")]),(("Goldman","has"),[(1,"shown")]),(("Goldman","reveals"),[(1,"how")]),(("Goldman","shows"),[(1,"how")]),(("Goldmans","words,"),[(1,"the")]),(("Good","Money"),[(1,"or")]),(("Good","Money,"),[(1,"Selfs")]),(("Goodney","chastises"),[(1,"him")]),(("Goodney","suggests"),[(1,"feeling")]),(("Goodney,","who"),[(1,"encourages")]),(("Graham","Fuller"),[(1,"shortly")]),(("Greg","alternately"),[(1,"point")]),(("Greg","and"),[(1,"his"),(2,"Terry")]),(("Greg","confesses"),[(1,"to")]),(("Greg","regales"),[(1,"readers")]),(("Greg","slips"),[(1,"into")]),(("Greg","succumbs"),[(1,"to")]),(("Greg,","on"),[(1,"the")]),(("Greg,","we"),[(1,"hear")]),(("Greg.","Puffed"),[(1,"up")]),(("Gregory","Riding."),[(1,"Throughout")]),(("Gregory","gradually"),[(1,"surfaces")]),(("Gregory","offers"),[(1,"a")]),(("Gregorys","stylistic"),[(1,"pompand")]),(("Gregs","cultural"),[(1,"and")]),(("Gregs","easy"),[(1,"affectations")]),(("Gregs","lies"),[(1,"up")]),(("Gregs","more"),[(1,"flamboyant")]),(("Gregs","style"),[(1,"is")]),(("Gregs","stylistic"),[(1,"excesses")]),(("Gregs","voice"),[(1,"is"),(2,"also")]),(("Ground","of"),[(1,"Prejudice")]),(("Gullivers","Travels"),[(1,"for")]),(("Guyland","is"),[(1,"a")]),(("Gwyn","Barry"),[(1,"who"),(2,"is"),(2,"biography,"),(3,"and")]),(("Gwyn","Barry,"),[(1,"in"),(2,"a")]),(("Gwyn","also"),[(1,"gloats")]),(("Gwyn","notices"),[(1,"a")]),(("Gwyn","remains"),[(1,"a")]),(("Gwyn","starts"),[(1,"reading")]),(("Gwyn","to"),[(1,"play")]),(("Gwyn","with"),[(1,"a")]),(("Gwyn,","Amis"),[(1,"shows")]),(("Gwyn,","Richard"),[(1,"reflects")]),(("Gwyn,","also"),[(1,"serves")]),(("Gwyn,","are"),[(1,"[him],")]),(("Gwyn,","on"),[(1,"the")]),(("Gwyn,","the"),[(1,"mass")]),(("Gwyn.","Amiss"),[(1," ut")]),(("II","220)."),[(1,"Pipers")]),(("II","227-28)."),[(1,"This")]),(("II","228)."),[(1,"Doubtless")]),(("II","253)."),[(1,"How")]),(("II","254,"),[(1,"255).")]),(("II","257)."),[(1,"By")]),(("II","258)."),[(1,"Moreover,")]),(("II.","The"),[(1,"Infirm")]),(("III.","Regretfully"),[(1,"Yours")]),(("IV.","Kant"),[(1,"as")]),(("Ian","McEwan"),[(1,"once"),(2,"in")]),(("Id","better"),[(1,"change")]),(("Idea","of"),[(1,"that"),(2,"reason,"),(3,"humanity")]),(("Idea.","The"),[(1,"encounter")]),(("Ideas","of"),[(1,"the")]),(("Ideas.","To"),[(1,"imagine")]),(("If","Amis"),[(1,"the"),(2,"critiques")]),(("If","Amiss"),[(1,"presence")]),(("If","Pipers"),[(1,"unstated")]),(("If","art"),[(1,"is")]),(("If","blacks"),[(1,"learn")]),(("If","etiquette"),[(1,"works"),(2,"designates")]),(("If","for"),[(1,"Piper")]),(("If","in"),[(1,"Money,")]),(("If","it"),[(1,"thus")]),(("If","modernist"),[(1,"celebrity")]),(("If","not"),[(1,"in")]),(("If","one"),[(1,"part")]),(("If","performative"),[(1,"utterances")]),(("If","racism"),[(1,"works"),(2,"permits")]),(("If","so,"),[(1,"then"),(2,"handing")]),(("If","the"),[(1,"relation"),(2,"outrage"),(2,"logic")]),(("If","these"),[(1,"categories")]),(("If","this"),[(1,"state")]),(("If","todays"),[(1,"prevailing")]),(("If","we"),[(1,"look")]),(("If","you"),[(1,"believed")]),(("If,","according"),[(1,"to")]),(("If,","however,"),[(1,"the")]),(("Im","a"),[(1,"bit")]),(("Im","calling"),[(1,"its")]),(("Im","ready"),[(1,"for")]),(("Immanuel","Kant's"),[(1,"Critique")]),(("In","January"),[(1,"1995")]),(("In","My"),[(1,"Calling")]),(("In","Pipers"),[(1,"justly")]),(("In","Styles"),[(1,"of")]),(("In","a"),[(1,"wee"),(2,"way,"),(2,"sequence"),(2,"sense,"),(2,"revision"),(2,"publicity"),(2,"nuanced"),(3,"million")]),(("In","accordance"),[(1,"with")]),(("In","an"),[(1,"interior"),(3,"essay")]),(("In","brief,"),[(1,"these"),(2,"the")]),(("In","circulation,"),[(1,"moreover,")]),(("In","contrast"),[(1,"to")]),(("In","doing"),[(3,"so,")]),(("In","each"),[(1,"of")]),(( irlfriend")]),(("Johns","Money,"),[(1,"he")]),(("Johns","asks"),[(1,"him")]),(("Johns","insatiable"),[(1,"appetite")]),(("Johns","misunderstanding"),[(1,"of")]),(("Johns","very"),[(1,"appetite,")]),(("Jon","Begleys"),[(1,"sense"),(2,"observation")]),(("Jonathan","Cape,"),[(1,"an")]),(("Jonathan","Goldman"),[(1,"has")]),(("Joyce","(5)."),[(1,"Further,")]),(("Joyce","and"),[(1,"others"),(2,"other"),(3,"Eliot")]),(("Joyce","as"),[(1,"a")]),(("Joyce","initially"),[(1,"favored")]),(("Joyce","the"),[(1,"celebrity")]),(("Joyce","was"),[(1,"the")]),(("Joyce,","or"),[(1,"Chaplin")]),(("Joyce.","Joyce"),[(1,"was")]),(("Joycean","appeal:"),[(1,"One")]),(("Joycean","appeals"),[(1,"to")]),(("Joycean","aspirations,"),[(1,"while")]),(("Joycean","creator,"),[(1,"behind")]),(("Joyces","(and"),[(1,"others)")]),(("Joyces","Portrait,"),[(1,"one")]),(("Joyces","Ulysses"),[(1,"is")]),(("Joyces","Work"),[(1,"in")]),(("Joyces","interest"),[(1,"in")]),(("Joyces","own"),[(1,"Stephens")]),(("Joyces","production"),[(1,"of")]),(("Julian","Barnes,"),[(1,"Kavanaghs")]),(("Kant","also"),[(1,"suggests")]),(("Kant","and"),[(1,"to")]),(("Kant","and,"),[(1,"consequently,")]),(("Kant","are"),[(1,"slightly")]),(("Kant","as"),[(1,"Medium")]),(("Kant","calls"),[(1,"a")]),(("Kant","develops"),[(1,"in")]),(("Kant","didnt"),[(1,"envision")]),(("Kant","illusion"),[(1,"or")]),(("Kant","in"),[(1,"Pipers")]),(("Kant","is"),[(1,"a")]),(("Kant","remains"),[(1,"a")]),(("Kant","reveals"),[(1,"the")]),(("Kant","serves"),[(1,"as")]),(("Kant","suggests"),[(1,"not,")]),(("Kant","the"),[(1,"imagination")]),(("Kant","would"),[(1,"have")]),(("Kant's","Critique"),[(1,"of")]),(("Kant)","and"),[(1,"starved")]),(("Kant),","the"),[(1,"aesthetic")]),(("Kant,","Piper"),[(1,"insists")]),(("Kant,","but"),[(1,"rather")]),(("Kant,","even"),[(1,"though")]),(("Kant,","paradoxically,"),[(1,"pertains")]),(("Kant,","that"),[(1,"if")]),(("Kant.","From"),[(1,"the")]),(("Kant:","because"),[(1,"the")]),(("Kantian","aesthetics"),[(1,"the")]),( ers","notion"),[(1,"of")]),(("Pipers","notorious"),[(1,"series")]),(("Pipers","ongoing"),[(1,"fascination")]),(("Pipers","own"),[(1,"ruination"),(2,"metaperformances,")]),(("Pipers","papers"),[(1,"on")]),(("Pipers","plea"),[(1,"that")]),(("Pipers","political"),[(1,"art")]),(("Pipers","remark."),[(1,"The")]),(("Pipers","resuscitation"),[(1,"here")]),(("Pipers","ruination"),[(1,"is"),(2,"as")]),(("Pipers","self-portraits"),[(1,"are"),(2,"(since")]),(("Pipers","statement"),[(1,"that")]),(("Pipers","theory"),[(1,"of")]),(("Pipers","ultimate"),[(1,"pragmatic")]),(("Pipers","unstated"),[(1,"question")]),(("Pipers","worded"),[(1,"message")]),(("Pipers","words"),[(1,"for")]),(("Pipers","words,"),[(1,"[e]xperiencing")]),(("Pipers","work"),[(1,"more"),(2,"is")]),(("Pipers","work,"),[(1,"by")]),(("Pipers","xenophobic"),[(1,"self")]),(("Pipers),","that"),[(1,"is")]),(("Portrait,","one"),[(1,"that")]),(("Precisely","because"),[(1,"we")]),(("Prejudice","To"),[(1,"feel")]),(("Present","I:"),[(1,"Essay,")]),(("Present,","Maurice"),[(1,"Berger")]),(("Press,","a"),[(1,"private")]),(("Probably","he"),[(1,"was")]),(("Profundity","Requital"),[(1,"literary")]),(("Profundity","prize"),[(1,"of")]),(("Progress)","(125,"),[(1,"5).18")]),(("Proust,","too,"),[(1,"by")]),(("Publishers","acting"),[(1,"within")]),(("Puffed","up"),[(1,"on")]),(("Pure","Reason,"),[(1,"torn")]),(("Putting","oneself"),[(1,"in")]),(("Racial","sensitivity"),[(1,"(to")]),(("Racism,","if"),[(1,"it")]),(("Radical","Will:"),[(1,"Adrian")]),(("Rainey","and"),[(1,"reframing"),(2,"Aaron")]),(("Rainey","demonstrates"),[(1,"how")]),(("Random","House"),[(1,"UK,")]),(("Rather,","Amiss"),[(1,"self-reflexive")]),(("Rather,","these"),[(1,"novels")]),(("Readers","often"),[(1,"single")]),(("Readers","simply"),[(1,"cannot")]),(("Reagan-Thatcher","economic"),[(1,"policy")]),(("Reagan-Thatcher","era,"),[(1,"while")]),(("Reagans","U.S.:"),[(1,"The")]),(("Reason,","torn"),[(1,"out")]),(("Recall","that,"),[(1,"as")]),(("Recognize","the"),[( nce"),[(1,"between")]),(("The","difficulty"),[(1,"in")]),(("The","discomfort"),[(1,"of")]),(("The","distance"),[(1,"between")]),(("The","distrust"),[(1,"of")]),(("The","doubling"),[(1,"begins")]),(("The","elimination"),[(1,"of")]),(("The","encounter"),[(1,"in")]),(("The","etiquette"),[(1,"in")]),(("The","exchange"),[(1,"was"),(2,"of")]),(("The","faux"),[(1,"pas")]),(("The","fear"),[(1,"I")]),(("The","fictional"),[(1,"Little")]),(("The","final"),[(1,"question")]),(("The","full"),[(1,"text")]),(("The","general"),[(1,"character")]),(("The","gift"),[(1,"of")]),(("The","hero"),[(1,"is")]),(("The","house"),[(1,"is")]),(("The","human"),[(1,"story,")]),(("The","idea"),[(1,"of")]),(("The","illusionist,"),[(1,"the")]),(("The","immediate"),[(1,"rendering")]),(("The","impasse"),[(1,"may")]),(("The","innocent"),[(1,"eye")]),(("The","interest"),[(1,"of")]),(("The","interesting"),[(1,"thing")]),(("The","intrusion"),[(1,"tells")]),(("The","key"),[(1,"reference")]),(("The","language"),[(1,"of")]),(("The","marketing"),[(1,"of")]),(("The","mirror"),[(1,"image,")]),(("The","more"),[(1,"one")]),(("The","mortgage"),[(1,"is")]),(("The","norms"),[(1,"of")]),(("The","novel"),[(1,"thus"),(2,"supports"),(2,"is"),(2,"concludes"),(2,"also")]),(("The","novel,"),[(1,"set")]),(("The","novels"),[(1,"polarization"),(2,"narrative"),(2,"comic")]),(("The","obscure"),[(1,"meaning")]),(("The","original"),[(1,"scientific")]),(("The","phantasy"),[(1,"of")]),(("The","photographs"),[(1,"in")]),(("The","pictorial"),[(1,"rendering")]),(("The","possibility"),[(1,"of")]),(("The","presentation"),[(1,"of")]),(("The","primary"),[(1,"force")]),(("The","process"),[(1,"that")]),(("The","question"),[(2,"of"),(2,"asked")]),(("The","questions"),[(1,"raised")]),(("The","racism"),[(1,"that")]),(("The","racist"),[(1,"is")]),(("The","recognition"),[(1,"of")]),(("The","relation"),[(1,"between")]),(("The","relational"),[(1,"link")]),(("The","remainder"),[(1,"of")]),(("The","same"),[(1,"is")]),(("The","scandal"),[(1,"resonated" antial"),[(1,"sum")]),(("a","substitution"),[(1,"much")]),(("a","subtraction,"),[(1,"as")]),(("a","subversive"),[(1,"force")]),(("a","sudden"),[(1,"encounter")]),(("a","suggestion"),[(1,"that")]),(("a","suicide"),[(1,"move.")]),(("a","surfeit"),[(1,"upon")]),(("a","symptom"),[(2,"of")]),(("a","system"),[(1,"of"),(2,"in"),(2,"concomitant")]),(("a","talentless"),[(1,"scribbler")]),(("a","tall"),[(1,"white"),(2,"newcomer,")]),(("a","tape"),[(1,"recorder")]),(("a","tension"),[(1,"between")]),(("a","tepid"),[(1,"critical")]),(("a","terrified"),[(1,"child")]),(("a","text"),[(1,"or"),(2,"in")]),(("a","theater"),[(1,"of")]),(("a","theorization"),[(1,"of")]),(("a","thoroughly"),[(1,"mediated")]),(("a","threat,"),[(1,"more")]),(("a","tone"),[(1,"of")]),(("a","totalizing"),[(2,"market")]),(("a","totally"),[(1,"commodified")]),(("a","trace"),[(1,"or")]),(("a","tracing"),[(1,"that")]),(("a","trade"),[(1,"based")]),(("a","tramp,"),[(1,"now")]),(("a","transcendence"),[(1,"that")]),(("a","transcendent"),[(1,"reality")]),(("a","transcendental"),[(1,"unity"),(2,"quintessence,")]),(("a","transformation"),[(1,"in")]),(("a","triangle"),[(1,"of")]),(("a","triumphant"),[(1,"fantasy")]),(("a","troop"),[(1,"of")]),(("a","trope"),[(1,"through"),(2,"that,")]),(("a","true"),[(1,"hatred"),(2,"commitment?"),(2,"and")]),(("a","two-month"),[(1,"juice-and-water")]),(("a","unique"),[(1,"moment")]),(("a","universal"),[(1,"subject"),(2,"idea"),(2,"as-if")]),(("a","vacuity"),[(2,"that"),(2,"or"),(2,"in"),(2,"at")]),(("a","variety"),[(1,"of")]),(("a","vast"),[(2,"veil."),(2,"and")]),(("a","vastly"),[(1,"different")]),(("a","vehicle"),[(1,"and")]),(("a","veil"),[(2,"that"),(2,"out"),(2,"or"),(2,"covering"),(2,"behind")]),(("a","veiled"),[(1,"world"),(2,"life")]),(("a","veiling"),[(1,"of")]),(("a","verifiable"),[(1,"index")]),(("a","veritable"),[(1,"ontology"),(2,"mutation")]),(("a","vertiginous"),[(1,"ground")]),(("a","very"),[(1,"deep"),(2,"curious")]),(("a","victim"),[(1,"of")]),(("a","view"),[(1,"to") ing,"),[(1,"or")]),(("and","being."),[(1,"The")]),(("and","bereft"),[(1,"(Lacan")]),(("and","between"),[(1,"faux")]),(("and","beyond"),[(1,"experience,"),(2,"any")]),(("and","blinding,"),[(1,"one")]),(("and","boundaries"),[(1,"that")]),(("and","building"),[(1,"on")]),(("and","by"),[(2,"the"),(2,"no")]),(("and","can"),[(1,"that")]),(("and","careful"),[(1,"marketing")]),(("and","caricature,"),[(1,"seemingly")]),(("and","categorial"),[(1,"limits")]),(("and","categories"),[(1,"of")]),(("and","celebrityit"),[(1,"does")]),(("and","certain"),[(1,"knowledge")]),(("and","change"),[(1,"facing")]),(("and","charity."),[(1,"Wallowing")]),(("and","chastises"),[(1,"complicity,")]),(("and","circulation,"),[(1,"then")]),(("and","class"),[(1,"relations.")]),(("and","coherence"),[(1,"still")]),(("and","collectors.7"),[(1,"Self-Portrait")]),(("and","commercial"),[(1,"publicity.")]),(("and","communicability,"),[(1,"and")]),(("and","community,"),[(1,"but")]),(("and","complex"),[(1,"machine")]),(("and","complicity"),[(2,"with"),(2,"are")]),(("and","compromises"),[(1,"necessary")]),(("and","computer"),[(1,"hacking")]),(("and","concealment"),[(1,"in")]),(("and","conceptually"),[(1,"coherent")]),(("and","conquers"),[(1,"the")]),(("and","consequently"),[(1,"to")]),(("and","constitute"),[(1,"black")]),(("and","constituted"),[(1,"on")]),(("and","consumer"),[(1,"excesses")]),(("and","consumerist"),[(1,"individualism"),(2,"currency")]),(("and","contact"),[(1,"that")]),(("and","contempt."),[(1,"The")]),(("and","contingency,"),[(1,"of")]),(("and","contingent"),[(1,"nature")]),(("and","continued"),[(1,"so")]),(("and","convention"),[(1,"takes")]),(("and","conventional"),[(1,"habits")]),(("and","corporate"),[(1,"publishing"),(2,"marketing")]),(("and","corporeal"),[(1,"and")]),(("and","correction"),[(1,"itself")]),(("and","courtesy)"),[(1,"the")]),(("and","critics."),[(1,"On")]),(("and","critique"),[(1,"can")]),(("and","croissants,"),[(1,"[tolerating]")]),(("and","cultivates"),[(1,"a")]),(("and","culti ymous","interlocutor"),[(1,"within")]),(("anonymous.","A"),[(1,"question")]),(("another","claim:"),[(1,"it")]),(("another","concern"),[(1,"that")]),(("another","conventional"),[(1,"way")]),(("another","essay,"),[(1,"from")]),(("another","form"),[(1,"of")]),(("another","instance"),[(1,"of")]),(("another","kind"),[(3,"of")]),(("another","language"),[(1,"begins")]),(("another","level,"),[(1,"the")]),(("another","point"),[(1,"of")]),(("another","politics."),[(1,"Interestingly")]),(("another","regret)"),[(1,"without")]),(("another","seems"),[(1,"to")]),(("another","story"),[(1,"of")]),(("another","way:"),[(1,"as")]),(("answer","clearly"),[(1,"has")]),(("answers","Richards"),[(1,"speculation")]),(("answers","not"),[(1,"to")]),(("anti-blackness","by"),[(1,"the")]),(("anti-blackness","does"),[(1,"not")]),(("anti-commercial","satirical"),[(1,"stance")]),(("anti-racism.","Piper"),[(1,"shows,")]),(("antidote","for"),[(1,"what")]),(("antidote","to"),[(1,"the"),(2,"provincial")]),(("antipathies.","Returning"),[(1,"to")]),(("antipathy","and"),[(1,"reversal.")]),(("antipathy","or"),[(1,"refusal,")]),(("antipathy,","etc."),[(1,"The")]),(("antithetic","to"),[(1,"universal")]),(("antithetical","doubles"),[(1,"coyly")]),(("anxieties","of"),[(1,"the"),(2,"privatized")]),(("anxieties","played"),[(1,"out")]),(("anxiety","about"),[(1,"nonexistence)")]),(("anxiety","at"),[(1,"the")]),(("anxiety","into"),[(1,"social")]),(("anxiety","that"),[(1,"signals")]),(("anxiety,","denial,"),[(1,"and")]),(("anxietycompound","interest."),[(1,"It")]),(("any","aesthetic"),[(1,"manifestation.")]),(("any","alternative"),[(1,"mode")]),(("any","alternatives"),[(2,"to")]),(("any","attempt"),[(1,"at")]),(("any","black"),[(1,"self-portrait")]),(("any","body,"),[(1,"and")]),(("any","case,"),[(1,"is")]),(("any","categorical"),[(1,"framework")]),(("any","certainty,"),[(1,"it")]),(("any","claims"),[(2,"to")]),(("any","consistent,"),[(1,"coherent")]),(("any","defensive"),[(1,"rationalization;")]),(("any","diegetic"), "),(2,"itself.")]),(("awareness","free"),[(1,"from")]),(("awareness","of"),[(1,"the"),(2,"ones"),(3,"a")]),(("awareness","of,"),[(1,"or")]),(("awareness","the"),[(1,"historical,")]),(("away","and"),[(1,"then"),(2,"Norway")]),(("away","anomalies,"),[(1,"and")]),(("away","any"),[(1,"residual")]),(("away","enormous"),[(1,"sums")]),(("away","from"),[(1,"itself"),(2,"defensive")]),(("away","is"),[(1,"exhilarating,")]),(("away","the"),[(1,"obvious")]),(("away","up"),[(1,"in")]),(("awful","lot"),[(1,"of")]),(("aworld","that"),[(1,"is")]),(("babbling","incoherence,"),[(1,"she")]),(("babyhood","and"),[(1,"in")]),(("back","and"),[(1,"observe")]),(("back","at"),[(1,"us")]),(("back","for"),[(1,"his")]),(("back","into"),[(1,"the")]),(("back","of"),[(1,"Kants")]),(("back","on"),[(1,"the")]),(("back","to"),[(2,"the"),(2,"publicity,"),(2,"London")]),(("back,","and"),[(1,"the")]),(("back,","which"),[(1,"produces")]),(("back.","I"),[(1,"am")]),(("backed","by"),[(1,"a")]),(("backstory","to"),[(1,"the")]),(("bad","faith"),[(1,"staked")]),(("balance","and"),[(1,"complicity")]),(("balance","between"),[(2,"satiric")]),(("banal,","a"),[(1,"pious")]),(("bank","charges,"),[(1,"interest")]),(("banking","and"),[(1,"stock")]),(("banking,","liquidity"),[(1,"preference,")]),(("bankrupt","and"),[(1,"living")]),(("banter","of"),[(1,"liftman,")]),(("bare","survival"),[(1,"of")]),(("barely","censored"),[(1,"racism")]),(("barely","having"),[(1,"escaped")]),(("barely","literate,"),[(1,"pay")]),(("barely","repressed"),[(1,"forms")]),(("barricade","itself"),[(1,"against")]),(("bars","(we"),[(1,"cant")]),(("based","in"),[(1,"dramatizing")]),(("based","on"),[(1,"the"),(2,"moral"),(2,"loyalty"),(2,"firsthand")]),(("based","only"),[(1,"on")]),(("based","partly"),[(1,"on")]),(("bases","her"),[(1,"appeal")]),(("basic","diegetic"),[(1,"level,")]),(("bastions","of"),[(1,"highbrow")]),(("be","(Xenophobia"),[(1,"293).")]),(("be","a"),[(1,"tramp,"),(2,"sign"),(2,"shared"),(2,"mere"),(2,"closet")]),(("be","able"),[( itled,"),[(1,"or")]),(("being","exceedingly"),[(1,"fallible")]),(("being","invaded"),[(1,"in")]),(("being","made"),[(1,"to")]),(("being","out"),[(2,"of")]),(("being","performed;"),[(1,"and")]),(("being","possible"),[(1,"to")]),(("being","provisional"),[(1,"(i.e.,")]),(("being","pushy"),[(1,"that")]),(("being","pushy,"),[(1,"manipulative,")]),(("being","redefined"),[(1,"and")]),(("being","reduced"),[(1,"once")]),(("being","remains"),[(1,"mere")]),(("being","seen"),[(1,"while")]),(("being","shut"),[(3,"out")]),(("being","so"),[(1,"weakened")]),(("being","socially"),[(1,"received")]),(("being","struck"),[(1,"unawares,")]),(("being","the"),[(1,"nave")]),(("being","with"),[(1,"appearance.")]),(("being,","a"),[(1,"substitution")]),(("being,","aesthetically,"),[(1,"its")]),(("being,","and"),[(1,"this")]),(("being,","or"),[(1,"truth")]),(("being.","If"),[(1,"we")]),(("being.","The"),[(1,"sublime"),(2,"difference")]),(("being:","even"),[(1,"if")]),(("belated","recognition,"),[(1,"in")]),(("belief","cannot"),[(1,"account")]),(("belief","in"),[(1,"artistic")]),(("belief","or"),[(1,"pretense")]),(("belief","system"),[(1,"and")]),(("belief","that"),[(1,"we"),(2,"the"),(2,"it"),(2,"blackness")]),(("belief","to"),[(1,"be")]),(("belief,","which"),[(1,"is")]),(("beliefs","a"),[(1,"veil")]),(("believable","but"),[(1,"that")]),(("believe","anything"),[(1,"(180-1).")]),(("believe","her"),[(1,"or")]),(("believe","that"),[(1,"these"),(2,"there"),(2,"certain")]),(("believe","what"),[(1,"will")]),(("believed","it,"),[(1,"youll")]),(("believes","that"),[(1,"Kants")]),(("belong","any"),[(1,"more.")]),(("belong","to"),[(1,"the"),(2,"me")]),(("belonged","to"),[(1,"has")]),(("belongs","in"),[(1,"the")]),(("beneath","experience,"),[(1,"nor")]),(("benefit","from"),[(1,"its")]),(("benefits","and"),[(1,"anxieties")]),(("benefits","for"),[(1,"doing")]),(("benefits","from"),[(1,"the")]),(("bereft","(Lacan"),[(1,"81).")]),(("beset","with"),[(1,"self-deception")]),(("best","intentions)"),[(1,"we")]),(( h","abstract"),[(1,"and")]),(("both","an"),[(1,"aesthetic")]),(("both","are"),[(1,"fragments"),(2,"destined")]),(("both","beginning"),[(1,"to")]),(("both","called"),[(1,"upon")]),(("both","conservative"),[(1,"solutions")]),(("both","defense"),[(1,"and")]),(("both","depict"),[(1,"various")]),(("both","desire"),[(1,"and")]),(("both","expressible"),[(1,"and")]),(("both","fantasy"),[(1,"and")]),(("both","faux"),[(1,"pas")]),(("both","figures"),[(1,"within")]),(("both","figures,"),[(1,"even")]),(("both","formalisms"),[(1,"fantasy")]),(("both","given"),[(1,"and")]),(("both","giver"),[(1,"and")]),(("both","grounded"),[(1,"in")]),(("both","hallucinated"),[(1,"as")]),(("both","idea"),[(1,"and")]),(("both","in"),[(1,"the"),(3,"others")]),(("both","intelligible"),[(1,"and")]),(("both","invites"),[(1,"this")]),(("both","mental"),[(1,"and")]),(("both","more"),[(1,"intimate")]),(("both","nature"),[(1,"and")]),(("both","necessary"),[(1,"(a")]),(("both","norm"),[(1,"as")]),(("both","novels"),[(1,"and")]),(("both","obliquity"),[(1,"and")]),(("both","ones"),[(1,"difference")]),(("both","politesse"),[(1,"and")]),(("both","psychoanalytically"),[(1,"and")]),(("both","racist"),[(1,"language"),(2,"and")]),(("both","rewards"),[(1,"and")]),(("both","speech"),[(1,"acts")]),(("both","subjected"),[(1,"and")]),(("both","sublime"),[(1,"and")]),(("both","the"),[(1,"sales"),(2,"racism"),(2,"portrait"),(2,"necessity"),(2,"naming"),(2,"giver"),(2,"frame"),(2,"categories")]),(("both).","The"),[(1,"threat")]),(("boudoir)","(Burke"),[(1,"145,")]),(("bound","by"),[(1,"capricious")]),(("bound","to"),[(1,"self-deception")]),(("bound","up"),[(2,"with")]),(("boundaries","of"),[(1,"the"),(2,"my")]),(("boundaries","that"),[(1,"Piper")]),(("boundary","beyond"),[(1,"which")]),(("boundary","has"),[(1,"already")]),(("bourgeois","and"),[(1,"corporate")]),(("bourgeois","systems"),[(1,"of")]),(("bowtie","and"),[(1,"a")]),(("boy","invoked"),[(1,"in")]),(("boy","or"),[(1,"by")]),(("boy","saw"),[(1,"a")]),(("boy).","Piper,"),[(1,"in")]),(("boy,","who"),[(1,"had")]),(("boy.","In"),[(1,"the")]),(("boyhood","that"),[(1,"the")]),(("boys","and"),[(1,"girls")]),(("brackets:","Pipers"),[(1,"resuscitation")]),(("brags","about"),[(1,"the")]),(("branching","out"),[(1,"from")]),(("brand","(Tew"),[(1,"78).")]),(("brand","and"),[(1,"the")]),(("brand","as"),[(1,"it")]),(("brand","in"),[(1,"particular")]),(("brand","is"),[(1,"produced")]),(("brand","name"),[(1,"(English")]),(("brand","name,"),[(1,"a")]),(("brand","name."),[(1,"Perusing"),(2,"Martin")]),(("brand","names,"),[(1,"buying")]),(("brand","names."),[(1,"Sarah")]),(("brand","precisely"),[(1,"by")]),(("brand","within"),[(1,"the")]),(("brand,","and"),[(1,"what")]),(("brand-name?","Certainly."),[(1,"As")]),(("brand.","The"),[(1,"novel,"),(2,"novel")]),(("brand?","In"),[(1,"the")]),(("branding","of"),[(1,"authorial")]),(("branding","reveal"),[(1,"self-reflexive")]),(("branding.","So"),[(1,"through")]),(("breach.","V."),[(1,"Cognitive")]),(("break","or"),[(1,"rupture")]),(("break","out"),[(1,"(170).")]),(("break","out,"),[(1,"and")]),(("breakdown","and"),[(1,"terror,")]),(("breakfasting","on"),[(1,"fresh")]),(("breaks","through"),[(1,"the")]),(("breeding),","such"),[(1,"intransitive")]),(("bridge","as"),[(1,"a")]),(("bridge","the"),[(1,"gap")]),(("bridges","the"),[(1,"gap")]),(("brief","divagation"),[(1,"into")]),(("brief,","blackness"),[(1,"is")]),(("brief,","the"),[(1,"anomalous")]),(("brief,","these"),[(1,"cards")]),(("briefly","chart"),[(1,"those")]),(("briefly","interjects"),[(1,"with")]),(("briefly","to"),[(1,"an")]),(("bring","out,"),[(1,"to")]),(("bring","the"),[(1,"affect")]),(("brings","an"),[(2,"end")]),(("brings","into"),[(1,"focus")]),(("brings","its"),[(1,"revenges")]),(("brings","to"),[(1,"surfeit"),(2,"it,")]),(("brings","together,"),[(1,"violently")]),(("brings","us"),[(1,"back")]),(("briskly","materialistic"),[(1,"age.")]),(("broad","theoretical"),[(1,"underpinnings")]),(("broke:","his"),[(1,"job")]),(("broken","his"),[(1," ings")]),(("cards,","then,"),[(1,"it")]),(("cards,","we"),[(1,"remain,")]),(("career,","we"),[(1,"see")]),(("careful","marketing"),[(1,"of")]),(("carefully","cultivated"),[(1,"niche")]),(("carefully","packaged"),[(1,"mass")]),(("caricatural","excess"),[(1,"of")]),(("caricature","of"),[(1,"unbridled")]),(("caricature,","seemingly"),[(1,"present")]),(("caricatured","but"),[(1,"oddly")]),(("caricatures","of"),[(1,"social")]),(("caricatures,","typical"),[(1,"of")]),(("caricatures.8","Rather,"),[(1,"these")]),(("caricaturesof","Johns"),[(1,"insatiable")]),(("carries","an"),[(1,"awful")]),(("cartoonish","and"),[(1,"self-conscious")]),(("cartoonish","caricatures.8"),[(1,"Rather,")]),(("cartoonish","delightWe"),[(1,"always")]),(("cartoonish","style"),[(1,"of")]),(("case","and"),[(1,"his")]),(("case","in"),[(1,"particular"),(2,"Kants")]),(("case","is"),[(1,"more")]),(("case","of"),[(1,"the"),(2,"etiquette,")]),(("case","was"),[(1,"the")]),(("case,","is"),[(1,"the")]),(("case,","the"),[(1,"indexical")]),(("case.","But"),[(1,"the")]),(("cash","because"),[(1,"Veale")]),(("cassettes,","the"),[(1,"photographs")]),(("cast","by"),[(1,"metaphysical")]),(("cast","out"),[(1,"from")]),(("catalogue","of"),[(1,"Gregs")]),(("catalysis","and"),[(1,"growth."),(2,"growth,")]),(("cataract,","by"),[(1,"which")]),(("catastrophe,","despite"),[(1,"Pipers")]),(("categorial","framework"),[(1,"collapses,")]),(("categorial","limits"),[(1,"of")]),(("categorial","unease"),[(1,"and")]),(("categorical","attitudes"),[(1,"and")]),(("categorical","framework"),[(1,"(Pipers")]),(("categorical","rules,"),[(1,"but")]),(("categorical","social"),[(1,"types,")]),(("categories","(Critique"),[(1,"87).")]),(("categories","(of"),[(1,"good")]),(("categories","[which"),[(1,"are")]),(("categories","are"),[(1,"mutable,"),(2,"constantly")]),(("categories","contain"),[(1,"social")]),(("categories","dont"),[(1,"fit,")]),(("categories","in"),[(1,"order")]),(("categories","of"),[(1,"thought."),(3,"the"),(2,"experience"),(2,"cl ","the"),[(2,"relation")]),(("explicitly","concerned"),[(1,"with")]),(("explicitly","for"),[(1,"the")]),(("explicitly","function"),[(1,"as")]),(("explicitness,","but"),[(1,"already")]),(("explodes","the"),[(1,"myth")]),(("exploits","and"),[(1,"explodes")]),(("exploits","of"),[(1,"the"),(2,"sex,")]),(("exploration","of"),[(1,"racial")]),(("explore","this"),[(1,"ambiguity")]),(("exploring,","at"),[(1,"least")]),(("expos","of"),[(1,"racism,")]),(("expose","oneself"),[(1,"as")]),(("expose","racism"),[(1,"and")]),(("expose","racism?"),[(1,"The")]),(("expose","that"),[(1,"fantasy.")]),(("expose,","simultaneously,"),[(1,"the")]),(("exposed","and"),[(1,"revealed")]),(("exposed","by"),[(1,"this")]),(("exposed","in"),[(1,"its")]),(("exposed","to"),[(1,"the")]),(("exposed,","ever"),[(1,"fragile")]),(("exposed,","ghostly,"),[(1,"and")]),(("exposes","a"),[(1,"kind")]),(("exposes","an"),[(1,"already")]),(("exposes","both"),[(1,"desire")]),(("exposes","its"),[(1,"own")]),(("exposes-obscures.","The"),[(1,"exchange")]),(("exposing","the"),[(1,"compromises")]),(("exposure","and"),[(1,"revelation,"),(2,"regret,"),(2,"in"),(2,"concealment")]),(("exposure","of"),[(1,"a")]),(("exposure","or"),[(1,"concealment,")]),(("exposure","the"),[(1,"photos")]),(("exposure","to"),[(1,"the"),(2,"Kantian")]),(("exposure,","forfeiting"),[(1,"visibility")]),(("exposure,","which"),[(1,"makes")]),(("exposure.","The"),[(1,"signifier")]),(("exposure:","the"),[(1,"cards")]),(("express","anything"),[(1,"more")]),(("express","his"),[(1,"big-spending")]),(("expressed","and"),[(1,"experienced.")]),(("expressed","suspicion"),[(1,"regarding")]),(("expressed","xenophobia"),[(1,"be")]),(("expressed,","outed,"),[(1,"but")]),(("expresses","his"),[(1,"limited")]),(("expressible","and"),[(1,"repeatable,")]),(("expressing","a"),[(1,"characters")]),(("expressing","her"),[(1,"discomfort")]),(("expression","itself."),[(1,"Then")]),(("expression","of"),[(1,"pompous"),(2,"deep-seated"),(2,"an"),(2,"a"),(2,"Pipers")]),(("expre ,","the"),[(1,"more")]),(("fact,","this"),[(1,"necessity")]),(("factfile","of"),[(1,"sensational")]),(("facts","of"),[(1,"our")]),(("facts","to"),[(1,"the")]),(("facts.","More"),[(1,"pertinently,")]),(("failed","ingestion,"),[(1,"of")]),(("failed","suicide"),[(1,"bid.")]),(("failed","writers"),[(1,"and")]),(("failing","novelist"),[(1,"trying")]),(("failing","that,"),[(1,"certainly")]),(("failing","to"),[(1,"communicate")]),(("failperhaps","serves"),[(1,"in")]),(("fails","to"),[(1,"recognize"),(2,"furnish"),(2,"follow"),(2,"appear;")]),(("failure","and"),[(1,"Gwyns")]),(("failure","either"),[(1,"way.")]),(("failure","in"),[(1,"the"),(2,"a")]),(("failure","of"),[(1,"unionization"),(3,"the"),(2,"reason"),(2,"leftist"),(2,"imagination"),(3,"empathy")]),(("failure","or"),[(1,"error")]),(("failure","to"),[(1,"make")]),(("failure,","Gwyns"),[(1,"celebrity")]),(("failure.","The"),[(1,"second")]),(("failures","of"),[(1,"cognitive"),(2,"cognition,")]),(("faith","in"),[(1,"the")]),(("faith","staked"),[(1,"on")]),(("faith","that"),[(1,"at")]),(("fall","(inside"),[(1,"a")]),(("fall","(into"),[(1,"racist")]),(("fall","and"),[(1,"revelation,")]),(("fall","down"),[(1,"a")]),(("fall","into"),[(1,"gradual")]),(("fall.","By"),[(1,"choosing")]),(("fallacy,","hyperinflation,"),[(1,"business")]),(("fallible","and"),[(1,"regularly"),(2,"precarious")]),(("falling","down"),[(1,"while")]),(("falling","is"),[(1,"derived")]),(("falls","into"),[(1,"a")]),(("falls","outside"),[(1,"pseudorationality")]),(("falls","victim"),[(1,"to")]),(("false","consciousness,"),[(1,"the")]),(("false","economy"),[(1,"(24).")]),(("false","or"),[(1,"distorted")]),(("false.","The"),[(1,"card")]),(("falsehood,","is"),[(1,"not")]),(("falsehood.","A"),[(1,"faux")]),(("falsely","appear"),[(1,"to")]),(("falsely","immediate,"),[(1,"and")]),(("falsification","(pastiche"),[(1,"or")]),(("falsity,","and"),[(1,"yet")]),(("faltering","because"),[(1,"the")]),(("fame","against"),[(1,"the")]),(("familiar","contempt."),[(1,"I")]),( ic")]),(("functions","and"),[(1,"our")]),(("functions","as"),[(1,"a")]),(("functions","of"),[(1,"high")]),(("functions","or"),[(1,"moral")]),(("functions","then"),[(1,"not")]),(("functions","within"),[(1,"the"),(2,"a")]),(("functionsone","in"),[(1,"which")]),(("fundamental,","then"),[(1,"Pipers")]),(("funds","for"),[(1,"municipal")]),(("furnish","a"),[(1,"direct,")]),(("further","clarification"),[(1,"or")]),(("further","extension."),[(1,"And")]),(("further","feeds"),[(1,"this")]),(("further","in"),[(1,"what")]),(("further","let"),[(1,"us")]),(("further","polarize"),[(1,"Richards")]),(("further","questions"),[(1,"regarding")]),(("further","serves"),[(1,"a")]),(("furthermore","as"),[(1,"what")]),(("furthermore","the"),[(1,"illusory")]),(("furtive","bad"),[(1,"faith")]),(("fuse","them"),[(1,"completely.")]),(("fusion","between"),[(1,"categorial")]),(("future","desire"),[(1,"for")]),(("future","market"),[(1,"for")]),(("future","racist"),[(1,"and")]),(("future","work."),[(1,"Richard")]),(("future","work.5"),[(1,"Amiss")]),(("gaffe","that"),[(1,"causes")]),(("gaffes","makes"),[(1,"the")]),(("gaffes,","thus"),[(1,"making")]),(("gallery","(41)."),[(1,"In")]),(("gallery","owners"),[(1,"and")]),(("game","Amis"),[(1,"was")]),(("game","is"),[(1,"part")]),(("game","of"),[(1,"chess.")]),(("game","that"),[(1,"Amiss")]),(("game,","Amis"),[(1,"explains")]),(("game,","searching"),[(1,"for")]),(("game.","Already"),[(1,"I")]),(("game.6","Martin"),[(1,"Amis")]),(("gap","(without"),[(1,"denying")]),(("gap","between"),[(1,"private"),(2,"image"),(2,"cognition")]),(("gap","or"),[(1,"veil"),(2,"dispersion"),(2,"disjointure")]),(("gap,","but"),[(1,"also")]),(("gaps","in"),[(1,"imagination")]),(("gauge","fully"),[(1,"the")]),(("gave","him"),[(1,"great")]),(("gave","it"),[(1,"to")]),(("gaze","as"),[(1,"through")]),(("gaze","blackens"),[(1,"the")]),(("gaze","here"),[(1,"sets")]),(("gaze","is"),[(1,"laid")]),(("gaze","observes"),[(1,"her")]),(("gaze","of"),[(2,"the")]),(("gaze","over"),[(1,"the") er")]),(("historical,","political,"),[(1,"and")]),(("historically","has"),[(1,"been")]),(("historically","significant."),[(1,"It")]),(("historicity","that"),[(1,"is")]),(("historico-political,","as"),[(1,"it")]),(("history","and"),[(1,"politics,")]),(("history","of"),[(1,"aesthetics")]),(("history","until"),[(1,"three.")]),(("history,","1848"),[(1,"and")]),(("hold","onto"),[(1,"some")]),(("hold-out","against"),[(1,"the")]),(("holding","in"),[(1,"check")]),(("holding","out"),[(1,"the")]),(("holding","the"),[(1,"most"),(2,"card.")]),(("holdout","on"),[(1,"a")]),(("holds","up"),[(1,"for")]),(("hole","that"),[(1,"can")]),(("homogenizing","forces"),[(1,"of")]),(("honestly","expect"),[(1,"you")]),(("honesty?","And"),[(1,"if")]),(("honor,","respect,"),[(1,"humility,")]),(("honorific","stereotypes"),[(1,"that")]),(("hooked.","On"),[(1,"the")]),(("hope","of"),[(1,"escape")]),(("hoped","that"),[(1,"in")]),(("hopes","that"),[(1,"the")]),(("hopes","to"),[(1,"draw")]),(("hoping","to"),[(1,"cause")]),(("horizon","that"),[(1,"demands")]),(("horrendous","sight"),[(1,"of")]),(("horror","at"),[(1,"the")]),(("horror","that"),[(1,"overwhelms"),(2,"limits")]),(("hospital,","usually"),[(1,"before")]),(("hospitality","towards"),[(1,"the")]),(("hour","."),[(1,".")]),(("house","and"),[(1,"its")]),(("house","is"),[(1,"on")]),(("house","next"),[(1,"to")]),(("house","whose"),[(1,"authors,")]),(("house.","The"),[(1,"house")]),(("housed","all"),[(1,"the")]),(("hover","and"),[(1,"be")]),(("hovering","behind"),[(1,"the")]),(("how","Amiss"),[(1,"fiction"),(2,"case")]),(("how","Fielding"),[(1,"duped")]),(("how","Joyce"),[(1,"the"),(2,"and")]),(("how","are"),[(2,"we")]),(("how","can"),[(1,"the"),(2,"racism"),(2,"I")]),(("how","do"),[(2,"you"),(2,"we")]),(("how","does"),[(1,"one")]),(("how","his"),[(1,"fiction")]),(("how","innocent"),[(1,"or")]),(("how","it"),[(1,"will")]),(("how","long"),[(1,"can")]),(("how","people"),[(1,"ought")]),(("how","politically"),[(1,"correct")]),(("how","racism"),[(1,"in")] ly")]),(("immediacy","and"),[(1,"the")]),(("immediacy","as"),[(1,"the")]),(("immediacy","at"),[(1,"the")]),(("immediacy","before"),[(1,"habit")]),(("immediacy","into"),[(1,"question,")]),(("immediacy","is"),[(1,"inscribed")]),(("immediacy","of"),[(1,"the")]),(("immediacy","that"),[(1,"puts")]),(("immediacy","whose"),[(1,"effects")]),(("immediacy,","her"),[(1,"argument")]),(("immediacy,","singularity,"),[(1,"etc.")]),(("immediacy,","there"),[(1,"is")]),(("immediate","consumption"),[(1,"prevalent")]),(("immediate","control,"),[(1,"it")]),(("immediate","effect"),[(1,"how")]),(("immediate","experience"),[(1,"of")]),(("immediate","experience,"),[(1,"independently")]),(("immediate","experience."),[(1,"As")]),(("immediate","experience:"),[(1,"they")]),(("immediate","meaning"),[(1,"will")]),(("immediate","or"),[(1,"present.")]),(("immediate","present"),[(1,"of")]),(("immediate","present."),[(1,"The")]),(("immediate","rendering"),[(1,"of")]),(("immediate","response"),[(1,"that")]),(("immediate,","and"),[(1,"so")]),(("immediate.","But"),[(1,"even")]),(("immediately,","and"),[(1,"without")]),(("immediately,","nonetheless"),[(1,"implies")]),(("immediately,","uniquely"),[(1,"known,")]),(("immortality","born"),[(1,"out")]),(("impact","of"),[(1,"the"),(2,"deregulated")]),(("impact","on"),[(1,"the")]),(("impasse","may"),[(1,"recall")]),(("impasse:","in"),[(1,"a")]),(("impels","us"),[(1,"to")]),(("imperative","to"),[(1,"endless")]),(("imperfection?","And"),[(1,"who")]),(("imperious","to"),[(1,"the")]),(("impersonal","intimacy."),[(1,"In")]),(("impersonal","norms"),[(1,"of")]),(("impersonal,","or"),[(1,"merely")]),(("impersonal.","Regret"),[(1,"and")]),(("implicated","in"),[(1,"these")]),(("implicates","Amis"),[(1,"with"),(2,"and")]),(("implicates","his"),[(1,"own")]),(("implicating","both"),[(1,"figures")]),(("implication","is"),[(1,"that")]),(("implication","that"),[(1,"racism")]),(("implication;","or,"),[(1,"again,")]),(("implications","of"),[(1,"ambiguity")]),(("implications.","B iolently"),[(1,"unrepresentable")]),(("is","vulnerable"),[(1,"and")]),(("is","what"),[(1,"we"),(2,"happens"),(2,"Piper")]),(("is","wholly"),[(1,"given")]),(("is","why"),[(1,"x-rationality"),(3,"she"),(2,"reading"),(2,"it"),(2,"her"),(2,"Piper"),(2,"My"),(2,"Kant"),(2,"Burke")]),(("is","why,"),[(1,"to"),(2,"presumably,"),(2,"in")]),(("is,","a"),[(1,"concept")]),(("is,","and"),[(1,"that")]),(("is,","as"),[(1,"habit,"),(2,"Amiss")]),(("is,","at"),[(1,"least")]),(("is,","by"),[(1,"assuming")]),(("is,","contributes"),[(1,"to")]),(("is,","evoke"),[(1,"exchange,")]),(("is,","for"),[(1,"ones")]),(("is,","how"),[(1,"do")]),(("is,","in"),[(1,"truth,"),(2,"other"),(2,"my"),(2,"fact,")]),(("is,","less"),[(1,"even")]),(("is,","not"),[(1,"on")]),(("is,","of"),[(1,"immanence"),(2,"course,")]),(("is,","presents"),[(1,"a")]),(("is,","prior"),[(1,"to")]),(("is,","rather,"),[(1,"an")]),(("is.","Blackness"),[(1,"disturbs")]),(("is:","how"),[(1,"long")]),(("is;","but"),[(1,"how")]),(("isnt","about"),[(1,"writers")]),(("isnt","always"),[(1,"already")]),(("isnt","new,"),[(1,"but")]),(("isnt","simply"),[(1,"that")]),(("isnt","this"),[(1,"because")]),(("isolation","nor"),[(1,"her")]),(("issue","is"),[(1,"a")]),(("it","(259)."),[(1,"As")]),(("it","(297)."),[(1,"As")]),(("it","(33)."),[(1,"Greg,")]),(("it","(Burke"),[(1,"133,")]),(("it","(Critique"),[(1,"88)?")]),(("it","(Out"),[(1,"of")]),(("it","about"),[(1,"the")]),(("it","abstractly"),[(1,"and")]),(("it","accomplishes"),[(1,"something")]),(("it","all]?"),[(1,"Because")]),(("it","allows"),[(1,"one")]),(("it","also"),[(1,"withholds"),(2,"underpins"),(2,"suggests"),(2,"reveal,"),(2,"permits")]),(("it","and"),[(1,"despite"),(2,"cultivates")]),(("it","another"),[(1,"way:")]),(("it","answers"),[(1,"not")]),(("it","anymore."),[(1,"I")]),(("it","arises"),[(1,"from")]),(("it","as"),[(1,"suddenly"),(2,"such."),(2,"such,"),(2,"a")]),(("it","attempts"),[(1,"the")]),(("it","back."),[(1,"I")]),(("it","be"),[(1,"considered")]),(("it","becomes"),[(1,"possible"),(2,"clear"),(2,"a")]),(("it","being"),[(1,"possible")]),(("it","brings"),[(1,"together,")]),(("it","calls"),[(1,"attention")]),(("it","can"),[(1,"produce"),(4,"only"),(2,"no"),(2,"heighten"),(2,"exceed"),(2,"distinguish"),(2,"always")]),(("it","cannot"),[(1,"guarantee"),(2,"be"),(2,"at")]),(("it","circulates"),[(2,"in")]),(("it","collapses"),[(1,"any")]),(("it","constitutes"),[(1,"me"),(2,"a")]),(("it","continues"),[(2,"to")]),(("it","contrasts"),[(1,"Amiss")]),(("it","could"),[(2,"be")]),(("it","culminates"),[(1,"Amiss")]),(("it","dawned"),[(1,"upon")]),(("it","demands"),[(1,"a")]),(("it","denotes"),[(1,"the")]),(("it","describes"),[(1,"a")]),(("it","designates"),[(1,"an")]),(("it","disappears"),[(1,"into")]),(("it","discloses"),[(1,"or")]),(("it","do"),[(1,"this?")]),(("it","does"),[(2,"not"),(2,"in"),(2,"a")]),(("it","down"),[(1,"on")]),(("it","ends."),[(1,"It")]),(("it","evokes"),[(1,"between")]),(("it","exposes-obscures."),[(1,"The")]),(("it","from"),[(1,"the")]),(("it","functions"),[(1,"as")]),(("it","gave"),[(1,"him")]),(("it","had"),[(1,"close")]),(("it","has"),[(1,"traditionally"),(2,"nothing"),(2,"no"),(4,"been"),(2,"accrued.")]),(("it","in"),[(1,"the"),(2,"its"),(2,"common"),(2,"a")]),(("it","inevitable"),[(1,"that")]),(("it","initiates"),[(1,"Amiss")]),(("it","interminably."),[(1,"If")]),(("it","into"),[(1,"the"),(2,"a")]),(("it","is"),[(1,"viewed"),(2,"used"),(2,"unavoidable,"),(2,"true;"),(2,"true,"),(2,"to"),(2,"through"),(2,"this"),(4,"the"),(3,"precisely"),(2,"personal."),(2,"perhaps"),(3,"only"),(4,"not"),(3,"no"),(3,"neither"),(3,"more"),(2,"like"),(2,"is"),(2,"inescapable,"),(2,"indeed"),(2,"in"),(2,"impossible"),(2,"hoped"),(2,"he"),(2,"hard"),(2,"fundamental,"),(2,"experienced"),(2,"epistemologically"),(4,"difficult"),(2,"deep-seated:"),(2,"both"),(2,"better"),(2,"at"),(3,"as"),(3,"always"),(2,"also"),(2,"already"),(2,"affirmed"),(7,"a")]),(("it","is,"),[(1,"rather,"),(2,"in")]),(("it","is."),[(1,"Blackness")]),(("it","is;"),[(1,"but")] ing.")]),(("its","very"),[(1,"real"),(2,"iconicity,")]),(("its","voice."),[(1,"This")]),(("itself","(as"),[(1,"a")]),(("itself","a"),[(1,"metonym:"),(2,"kind"),(4,"fiction"),(2,"desire")]),(("itself","acted"),[(1,"to")]),(("itself","against"),[(1,"difference")]),(("itself","allegorically"),[(1,"veiled,")]),(("itself","an"),[(1,"inner"),(2,"infelicity"),(2,"allegory")]),(("itself","and"),[(1,"therefore")]),(("itself","as"),[(2,"the"),(2,"civility"),(2,"by"),(2,"blind,"),(2,"an"),(3,"a")]),(("itself","be"),[(1,"seen"),(2,"returned"),(2,"exchanged")]),(("itself","beset"),[(1,"with")]),(("itself","blind"),[(1,"and")]),(("itself","by"),[(1,"withdrawing"),(2,"establishing")]),(("itself","from"),[(1,"blackness,")]),(("itself","in"),[(2,"the"),(2,"its"),(2,"a")]),(("itself","is"),[(1,"put")]),(("itself","merely"),[(1,"a")]),(("itself","neither"),[(1,"an")]),(("itself","normative,"),[(1,"given")]),(("itself","of"),[(1,"any"),(2,"all")]),(("itself","on"),[(1,"its")]),(("itself","presupposes"),[(1,"an")]),(("itself","problematic,"),[(1,"since")]),(("itself","quite"),[(1,"telling.")]),(("itself","rather"),[(1,"typical")]),(("itself","reductive,"),[(1,"but")]),(("itself","relies"),[(1,"on")]),(("itself","reveals"),[(1,"to")]),(("itself","split"),[(1,"between")]),(("itself","suspended"),[(1,"amid")]),(("itself","that"),[(1,"has"),(2,"causes")]),(("itself","through"),[(1,"stereotypes.")]),(("itself","to"),[(1,"anger")]),(("itself","transcendentally"),[(1,"(as")]),(("itself","viewed"),[(1,"transcendentally;")]),(("itself","visible,"),[(1,"and")]),(("itself","within"),[(1,"culture.")]),(("itself","would"),[(1,"somehow")]),(("itself,","does"),[(1,"speech")]),(("itself,","for"),[(1,"what")]),(("itself,","has"),[(1,"become")]),(("itself,","or,"),[(1,"more")]),(("itself,","prior"),[(1,"to")]),(("itself,","which"),[(1,"is")]),(("itself.","In"),[(1,"short,")]),(("itself.","Indeed,"),[(1,"Piper")]),(("itself.","Racial"),[(1,"sensitivity")]),(("itself.","The"),[(1,"sublime")]),(("itself."," regulated"),[(1,"global"),(2,"finance")]),(("of","deregulation"),[(1,"and")]),(("of","derision,"),[(1,"hatred,")]),(("of","desire"),[(1,"itself.13")]),(("of","desire,"),[(1,"a")]),(("of","determinable"),[(1,"laws")]),(("of","determined"),[(1,"customs")]),(("of","devotion"),[(1,"to")]),(("of","difference"),[(1,"that"),(2,"itself."),(2,"for"),(2,"as")]),(("of","difference."),[(1,"As")]),(("of","differentiation"),[(1,"that")]),(("of","disappearing"),[(1,"ourselves,")]),(("of","disavowal"),[(1,"and")]),(("of","discomfort"),[(1,"and")]),(("of","discrimination,"),[(1,"Piper")]),(("of","disembodied"),[(1,"self-consciousness")]),(("of","displacement"),[(1,"are")]),(("of","dissolution"),[(1,"that")]),(("of","domestic"),[(1,"and")]),(("of","drawing"),[(1,"attention")]),(("of","duty,"),[(1,"a")]),(("of","duty."),[(1,"In")]),(("of","dwindling"),[(1,"estate")]),(("of","each"),[(1,"individual"),(2,"decision")]),(("of","eating"),[(1,"literally")]),(("of","economic"),[(1,"forces"),(2,"contradiction"),(2,"class,"),(2,"and")]),(("of","either"),[(1,"when"),(2,"position.")]),(("of","empathy"),[(1,"with"),(2,"and")]),(("of","empty"),[(1,"serial")]),(("of","encounter,"),[(1,"Piper")]),(("of","encountering"),[(1,"an")]),(("of","equality"),[(1,"and")]),(("of","escape"),[(1,"from")]),(("of","etiquette"),[(1,"that"),(2,"remain"),(2,"rather"),(2,"produce"),(2,"opposed"),(2,"is"),(2,"introduces"),(2,"erase"),(2,"confirm"),(2,"be"),(3,"as"),(2,"are"),(3,"and")]),(("of","etiquette,"),[(1,"these"),(2,"not"),(2,"as")]),(("of","etiquette."),[(1,"I")]),(("of","etiquette.)"),[(1,"Even")]),(("of","everyone"),[(1,"else:")]),(("of","exceptionalism,"),[(1,"an")]),(("of","exceptionalismhave"),[(1,"been")]),(("of","excess"),[(1,"and")]),(("of","excessive"),[(1,"individual"),(2,"and")]),(("of","exchange"),[(1,"with")]),(("of","exchanging"),[(1,"the")]),(("of","existence,"),[(1,"to")]),(("of","existential"),[(1,"abyss")]),(("of","experience"),[(1,"we"),(2,"is"),(2,"are"),(2,"(and")]),(("of","experience,"),[( ")]),(("only","when"),[(1,"I")]),(("only","where"),[(1,"(white)")]),(("only","within"),[(1,"the")]),(("onto","a"),[(1,"world")]),(("onto","authorial"),[(1,"control.")]),(("onto","her"),[(1,"reading")]),(("onto","some"),[(1,"literary")]),(("ontological","assault"),[(1,"and,")]),(("ontological","or"),[(1,"moral")]),(("ontology","of"),[(1,"civility")]),(("open","horizon"),[(1,"that")]),(("open","secret,"),[(1,"namely,")]),(("open","the"),[(1,"eye")]),(("open","up"),[(1,"racism")]),(("open,","no"),[(1,"matter")]),(("open.","My"),[(1,"lifeline")]),(("opened","up"),[(2,"by")]),(("openly","exchanges"),[(1,"sexual")]),(("openness","to"),[(1,"difference")]),(("openness,","and"),[(1,"acceptance")]),(("openness:","To"),[(1,"accept")]),(("opens","up"),[(1,"the"),(2,"an")]),(("opens","with"),[(1,"April")]),(("operate","on"),[(1,"two")]),(("operates","such"),[(1,"a")]),(("operation","he"),[(1,"received")]),(("operation","of"),[(1,"that")]),(("operative","within"),[(1,"the")]),(("opportunity","to"),[(1,"read")]),(("opposed","to"),[(1,"particularist"),(2,"a")]),(("opposed,","but"),[(1,"that")]),(("opposed:","the"),[(1,"encounter")]),(("opposite","of"),[(1,"the")]),(("opposites","on"),[(1,"the")]),(("opposition","between"),[(1,"particularity"),(2,"feeling")]),(("opposition,","not"),[(1,"to")]),(("optical","geometry"),[(1,"is")]),(("optics","more"),[(1,"than")]),(("optimistic","daylight."),[(1,"Then")]),(("or","Bad"),[(1,"Money,")]),(("or","Bildung,"),[(1,"but")]),(("or","Blendwerk"),[(1,"is")]),(("or","Chaplin"),[(1,"produce,")]),(("or","Evelyn"),[(1,"Waugh),")]),(("or","I)"),[(1,"remains")]),(("or","The"),[(1,"Information")]),(("or","a"),[(1,"withdrawal"),(2,"way"),(2,"seeing"),(2,"materiality"),(2,"faux"),(2,"family"),(2,"chess")]),(("or","above"),[(1,"his")]),(("or","absence,"),[(1,"but")]),(("or","accepted,"),[(1,"and")]),(("or","accusation."),[(1,"It")]),(("or","act"),[(1,"and")]),(("or","aesthetic"),[(1,"categories")]),(("or","again,"),[(2,"the")]),(("or","alter"),[(1,"ego.")] al","question,"),[(1,"or")]),(("political","reading"),[(1,"into")]),(("political","realms"),[(1,"as")]),(("political","responsibility"),[(1,"and"),(2,"(Piper,")]),(("political","sense"),[(1,"but")]),(("political","sign,"),[(1,"in")]),(("political","structures"),[(1,"are")]),(("political","targets"),[(1,"of")]),(("political","that"),[(1,"is")]),(("political,","I"),[(1,"am")]),(("political,","and"),[(1,"theoretical")]),(("political,","for"),[(1,"it")]),(("political,","or"),[(1,"even")]),(("political-artistic","response"),[(1,"to")]),(("politically","correct"),[(1,"or")]),(("politically","formative"),[(1,"only")]),(("politically","legible."),[(1,"These")]),(("politically","revised"),[(1,"notion")]),(("politically,","and"),[(1,"thus")]),(("politicization","of"),[(1,"her")]),(("politico-aesthetic","knowledge"),[(1,"of")]),(("politics","of"),[(1,"the"),(2,"racial"),(2,"his"),(2,"deregulation"),(2,"art"),(2,"Pipers")]),(("politics","on"),[(1,"display")]),(("politics","precisely"),[(1,"because")]),(("politics,","Kantian"),[(1,"critical")]),(("politics,","and"),[(1,"that")]),(("politics,","it"),[(1,"is")]),(("politics,","notably,"),[(1,"mimesis,")]),(("politics.","Indeed,"),[(1,"the")]),(("politics.","Interestingly"),[(1,"enough,")]),(("politics.","My"),[(1,"Calling")]),(("politics.","Though"),[(1,"it")]),(("pompand","Greg"),[(1,"confesses")]),(("pompous","affectation."),[(1,"But")]),(("pompous","superiority"),[(1,"rather")]),(("pornographic","indulgence"),[(1,"in")]),(("pornographic","pleasure"),[(1,"industries,")]),(("pornography","and"),[(1,"prostitutes;")]),(("porter,","and"),[(1,"swishing")]),(("portrait","and"),[(1,"the")]),(("portrait,","too,"),[(1,"in")]),(("portrait.","Since"),[(1,"any")]),(("portrayed","photographically"),[(1,"only")]),(("poses","questions"),[(1,"of")]),(("poses","the"),[(1,"threat")]),(("poses","this"),[(1,"problem:")]),(("posh","Gregory"),[(1,"offers")]),(("posh","consumer"),[(1,"opens")]),(("posh","job"),[(1,"at")]),(("posited","as"),[(1,"the")] ce,","in"),[(1,"Goldmans")]),(("produced","by"),[(1,"those"),(5,"the"),(2,"global")]),(("produced","from"),[(1,"a")]),(("produced","in"),[(1,"the")]),(("produced","its"),[(1,"own")]),(("produced","within"),[(1,"the")]),(("produces","along"),[(1,"with")]),(("produces","blindness,"),[(1,"and")]),(("produces","knowledge"),[(1,"that"),(2,"of")]),(("produces","spasms"),[(1,"in")]),(("produces","the"),[(1,"seen."),(2,"idealized"),(2,"author")]),(("producing","an"),[(1,"author")]),(("producing","art,"),[(1,"Brouillette")]),(("producing","cultural"),[(1,"capital")]),(("producing","literary"),[(1,"fiction")]),(("producing","the"),[(1,"authorial")]),(("product","of"),[(1,"the"),(2,"successful"),(2,"media"),(2,"his")]),(("product","that"),[(1,"shapes")]),(("production","and"),[(2,"the"),(2,"exchange,"),(2,"careful")]),(("production","contributed"),[(1,"to")]),(("production","helped"),[(1,"shape")]),(("production","in"),[(1,"individuation")]),(("production","of"),[(1,"top"),(6,"the"),(2,"literature,"),(3,"literary"),(2,"his"),(3,"fiction,"),(2,"celebrity"),(5,"authorial"),(2,"a"),(2,"Amis")]),(("production","program"),[(1,"[of]")]),(("production","still"),[(1,"harbors")]),(("production","that"),[(1,"Brouillette")]),(("production","today."),[(1,"I")]),(("production","under"),[(1,"the")]),(("production,","and"),[(1,"contingency,")]),(("production,","circulation,"),[(1,"and")]),(("production,","exemplified"),[(1,"by")]),(("production,","he"),[(1,"signals")]),(("production,","marketing,"),[(1,"and")]),(("production,","placing"),[(1,"him")]),(("production,","then"),[(1,"the")]),(("production.","But,"),[(1,"again,")]),(("production.","Despite"),[(1,"Richards")]),(("production.","Focusing"),[(1,"on")]),(("production.","In"),[(1,"a")]),(("production.","Specifically,"),[(1,"the")]),(("production.","This"),[(1,"fictional")]),(("production:","private"),[(1,"publishing")]),(("products","that"),[(1,"remain")]),(("productthe","cards"),[(1,"left")]),(("professional","routine."),[(1,"You")]),( urished")]),(("satiates","itself"),[(1,"on")]),(("satire","(and"),[(1,"the")]),(("satire","cannot"),[(1,"escape")]),(("satire","is"),[(1,"leveled,")]),(("satire","of"),[(1,"authorial")]),(("satire","on"),[(1,"the")]),(("satire","when"),[(1,"read")]),(("satire,","a"),[(1,"kind")]),(("satire,","its"),[(1,"important")]),(("satire,","such"),[(1,"as")]),(("satire.","But"),[(1,"Amiss")]),(("satire.","His"),[(1,"depictions")]),(("satires","on"),[(1,"social")]),(("satiric","authority"),[(2,"and")]),(("satirical","allegory"),[(1,"consciously")]),(("satirical","depiction"),[(1,"of")]),(("satirical","embrace"),[(1,"of")]),(("satirical","impact"),[(1,"of")]),(("satirical","reflection"),[(1,"on"),(2,"of")]),(("satirical","representation"),[(2,"of")]),(("satirical","sneer,"),[(1,"The")]),(("satirical","stance"),[(1,"cannot")]),(("satirical","structure"),[(1,"to")]),(("satirical","target,"),[(1,"as")]),(("satirical","treatment"),[(1,"of")]),(("satirically","disdainful"),[(1,"reflections")]),(("satirically","reflect"),[(1,"the")]),(("satirizes.","But"),[(1,"rather")]),(("satirizes.","Success"),[(1,"thus")]),(("satirizing","and"),[(1,"participating")]),(("satisfactions.","What"),[(1,"prevents")]),(("save","perhaps"),[(1,"in")]),(("saw","a"),[(1,"black")]),(("saw","as"),[(1,"a")]),(("saw","in"),[(1,"Piper)."),(2,"Du")]),(("saw","with"),[(1,"his")]),(("say","and"),[(1,"do,")]),(("say","is"),[(1,"supposed")]),(("say","it,"),[(1,"politeness.")]),(("say","it."),[(1,"This")]),(("say","or"),[(1,"the")]),(("say","such"),[(1,"pleasure")]),(("say","that"),[(1,"we"),(4,"the"),(2,"one"),(2,"in"),(2,"blackness")]),(("say,","Burke),"),[(1,"her")]),(("say,","aesthetically)"),[(1,"from")]),(("say,","and"),[(1,"signification,")]),(("say,","as"),[(1,"an")]),(("say,","by"),[(1,"a")]),(("say,","her"),[(1,"word")]),(("say,","marked"),[(1,"off,")]),(("say,","the"),[(1,"refusal"),(2,"desire")]),(("say:","My"),[(1,"philosophy")]),(("saying","or"),[(1,"doing")]),(("saying","she"),[(1,"is")]),(("says","Thing own")]),(("that","comically"),[(1,"reflect")]),(("that","compose"),[(1,"racist")]),(("that","conceives"),[(1,"of"),(2,"itself")]),(("that","confront"),[(1,"and")]),(("that","confuses"),[(1,"being")]),(("that","consists"),[(2,"of")]),(("that","conversation"),[(1,"with")]),(("that","cuts"),[(1,"through")]),(("that","darkness"),[(1,"sees")]),(("that","deep"),[(1,"collective")]),(("that","defined"),[(1,"British")]),(("that","demands"),[(1,"more"),(2,"a")]),(("that","disrupts"),[(1,"the")]),(("that","divides"),[(1,"blacks")]),(("that","does"),[(2,"not")]),(("that","dramatizes"),[(1,"the")]),(("that","draws"),[(1,"one")]),(("that","each"),[(1,"of")]),(("that","elicits"),[(1,"the")]),(("that","emerged"),[(1,"during")]),(("that","emerges"),[(1,"from")]),(("that","emptiness"),[(1,"to")]),(("that","enables"),[(1,"us")]),(("that","etiquette"),[(1,"provides"),(2,"offers")]),(("that","even"),[(1,"the")]),(("that","excludes"),[(1,"Piper")]),(("that","experience"),[(1,"is"),(2,"(Critique")]),(("that","exposes"),[(1,"its")]),(("that","expresses"),[(1,"his")]),(("that","failure."),[(1,"The")]),(("that","fantasy"),[(1,"resists")]),(("that","fantasy."),[(1,"Further,")]),(("that","feeling"),[(1,"ever")]),(("that","fictional"),[(1,"foreclosure")]),(("that","figuration"),[(1,"within")]),(("that","figuration,"),[(1,"Pipers")]),(("that","figures"),[(1,"or")]),(("that","finally"),[(1,"cause")]),(("that","followed"),[(1,"throughout"),(2,"(Delany")]),(("that","follows"),[(1,"our")]),(("that","forms"),[(1,"(fanaticism")]),(("that","gap"),[(1,"between")]),(("that","gives"),[(1,"it"),(2,"form")]),(("that","giving"),[(1,"voice")]),(("that","governs"),[(1,"this"),(2,"the"),(2,"its")]),(("that","grammar"),[(1,"of")]),(("that","grounds"),[(2,"the")]),(("that","grounds."),[(1,"On")]),(("that","handing"),[(1,"out")]),(("that","has"),[(1,"something"),(2,"now"),(5,"no"),(4,"come"),(2,"been")]),(("that","has,"),[(1,"for")]),(("that","have"),[(1,"defined"),(2,"been")]),(("that","he"),[(1,"was"),(2,"so"),( iqueness"),[(3,"of")]),(("the","universal"),[(1,"is"),(2,"and")]),(("the","universal;"),[(1,"and")]),(("the","universe"),[(1,"was")]),(("the","unknowable"),[(1,"extent")]),(("the","unrepresentable"),[(1,"moment")]),(("the","unseeing,"),[(1,"intransitive")]),(("the","unseen,"),[(1,"the")]),(("the","unveiled"),[(1,"body")]),(("the","unwanted"),[(1,"supplement")]),(("the","uttering"),[(1,"of")]),(("the","value"),[(2,"of")]),(("the","vanishing"),[(1,"that")]),(("the","vantage"),[(1,"point")]),(("the","various"),[(1,"veiled"),(2,"mises"),(2,"faux"),(2,"animal")]),(("the","vastly"),[(1,"indeterminate"),(2,"different")]),(("the","veil"),[(1,"signifies,"),(2,"metaphor,"),(2,"in"),(2,"can"),(2,"but")]),(("the","veil)"),[(1,"are")]),(("the","veil,"),[(1,"which")]),(("the","veil."),[(1,"Making")]),(("the","verbal"),[(1,"faux")]),(("the","verge"),[(1,"of")]),(("the","verification"),[(1,"of")]),(("the","very"),[(1,"vision"),(2,"terms"),(2,"separation"),(2,"place"),(2,"origin"),(2,"level"),(2,"highest,"),(2,"far,"),(2,"excess"),(2,"edge"),(2,"domain"),(3,"condition"),(2,"anomalous"),(3,"act")]),(("the","viability"),[(1,"of")]),(("the","vicissitudes"),[(1,"of")]),(("the","viewer"),[(2,"to"),(2,"simply"),(2,"see"),(2,"psychologically,"),(2,"in"),(2,"can")]),(("the","viewer,"),[(1,"independently"),(2,"directly")]),(("the","viewers"),[(1,"attention")]),(("the","violation"),[(2,"of")]),(("the","violence"),[(1,"that"),(2,"done")]),(("the","visible"),[(1,"is"),(2,"as"),(2,"(Burke")]),(("the","visible,"),[(1,"the"),(2,"namely,"),(2,"a")]),(("the","visiting"),[(1,"card")]),(("the","visual"),[(1,"and")]),(("the","vividness"),[(2,"and")]),(("the","voices"),[(1,"of")]),(("the","way"),[(3,"we"),(2,"those"),(3,"the"),(8,"that"),(2,"our"),(2,"in"),(2,"his"),(2,"Fielding"),(2,"(Information")]),(("the","ways"),[(1,"we"),(2,"they"),(3,"that"),(4,"in"),(2,"black")]),(("the","while"),[(1,"replicating"),(2,"following")]),(("the","white"),[(1,"subject"),(2,"art")]),(("the","whole"),[(1,"thing."),(2,"c ation"),[(1,"and")]),(("through","shared"),[(1,"interpersonal"),(2,"contexts,")]),(("through","stereotypes."),[(1,"Perhaps")]),(("through","subjection"),[(1,"rather")]),(("through","the"),[(1,"smug"),(2,"seduction"),(2,"regulative"),(3,"novels"),(2,"literary"),(2,"imposition"),(2,"illusion"),(3,"eyes"),(2,"defensive"),(2,"conventionalizing")]),(("through","their"),[(1,"discomfort")]),(("through","these"),[(1,"organs")]),(("through","this"),[(1,"example")]),(("through","till"),[(1,"twelve.")]),(("through","various"),[(1,"media,")]),(("through","which"),[(1,"the"),(2,"he")]),(("through:","without"),[(1,"it,")]),(("through;","I"),[(1,"held")]),(("throughout","the"),[(1,"novel."),(2,"novel"),(2,"essay,"),(2,"decade.15")]),(("throughout","this"),[(1,"essay:")]),(("thus","Kants"),[(1,"notion")]),(("thus","attempts"),[(1,"the")]),(("thus","becomes"),[(1,"impossible")]),(("thus","blurs"),[(1,"the")]),(("thus","diverges"),[(1,"from")]),(("thus","enacts"),[(1,"in")]),(("thus","experiencing"),[(1,"its")]),(("thus","find"),[(1,"their")]),(("thus","focuses"),[(1,"on")]),(("thus","his"),[(1,"literary")]),(("thus","indicate"),[(1,"why")]),(("thus","introduces"),[(1,"an")]),(("thus","it"),[(1,"answers")]),(("thus","making"),[(1,"etiquette")]),(("thus","plays"),[(1,"with")]),(("thus","poses"),[(1,"this")]),(("thus","raised"),[(1,"in")]),(("thus","readily"),[(1,"be")]),(("thus","realizes"),[(1,"that")]),(("thus","reformable."),[(1,"If")]),(("thus","rejoin"),[(1,"what")]),(("thus","serves"),[(1,"for")]),(("thus","shown"),[(1,"to")]),(("thus","suggests"),[(1,"Jon")]),(("thus","the"),[(1,"question"),(2,"original"),(2,"necessity")]),(("thus","to"),[(1,"look"),(2,"dissociate"),(2,"complicate")]),(("thus","weary"),[(1,"the")]),(("ticket","or"),[(1,"label.")]),(("tide","of"),[(1,"artificially")]),(("tie","of"),[(1,"ritualized")]),(("tied","to"),[(1,"sociability")]),(("till","one"),[(1,"girl,")]),(("till","twelve."),[(1,"Twelve")]),(("time","(125)."),[(1,"Amis")]),(("time","after,"),[(1,"upo ."),(3,"own"),(2,"media;"),(2,"lethal"),(2,"further"),(2,"formal"),(2,"effects"),(2,"dictates."),(2,"desire"),(2,"bearer,")]),(("to","jettison"),[(1,"preconceptions")]),(("to","judge"),[(1,"who"),(2,"is"),(2,"in")]),(("to","judge,"),[(1,"but")]),(("to","know"),[(1,"whether"),(2,"when"),(3,"that"),(2,"its"),(2,"in"),(2,"if")]),(("to","lack."),[(1,"This")]),(("to","large-scale"),[(1,"corporate")]),(("to","lay"),[(1,"down")]),(("to","learn"),[(1,"the"),(2,"that")]),(("to","literary"),[(1,"eminence")]),(("to","literature."),[(1,"When")]),(("to","live"),[(1,"on,"),(2,"in,")]),(("to","locate"),[(1,"the")]),(("to","look"),[(1,"on")]),(("to","lose"),[(1,"itself")]),(("to","make"),[(1,"the"),(2,"sure"),(2,"sense"),(3,"people"),(2,"lots"),(2,"a")]),(("to","manifest"),[(1,"itself")]),(("to","market"),[(1,"research")]),(("to","mask"),[(1,"his")]),(("to","me"),[(2,"that"),(2,"aspect,"),(2,"as")]),(("to","meI"),[(1,"certainly")]),(("to","meaning"),[(1,"or")]),(("to","measure"),[(1,"distances")]),(("to","mock"),[(2,"the")]),(("to","moral"),[(2,"or")]),(("to","my"),[(1,"racial"),(2,"mirror")]),(("to","nail"),[(1,"the")]),(("to","name"),[(2,"and")]),(("to","nature,"),[(1,"it")]),(("to","negotiate"),[(1,"the")]),(("to","not"),[(1,"get")]),(("to","note"),[(1,"that")]),(("to","one"),[(1,"dominated"),(2,"I")]),(("to","ones"),[(1,"difference,")]),(("to","open"),[(1,"up"),(2,"the")]),(("to","other"),[(1,"critics")]),(("to","others"),[(1,"need")]),(("to","ourselves"),[(1,"as")]),(("to","overcome"),[(1,"the")]),(("to","package"),[(1,"the")]),(("to","particularist"),[(1,"class")]),(("to","pay"),[(1,"sellers"),(2,"more")]),(("to","peer"),[(1,"at")]),(("to","people"),[(1,"who")]),(("to","peremptory"),[(1,"refusal,")]),(("to","perform"),[(1,"this"),(2,"the"),(2,"inappropriatenessto")]),(("to","play"),[(1,"with")]),(("to","please"),[(1,"readers.")]),(("to","political"),[(1,"or")]),(("to","pornography"),[(1,"and")]),(("to","possess"),[(1,"oneself")]),(("to","present"),[(1,"political"),(2,"her"),( sciously","lived"),[(1,"as")]),(("under","a"),[(1,"double")]),(("under","that"),[(1,"now")]),(("under","the"),[(2,"new"),(2,"increasingly"),(2,"global")]),(("under","their"),[(1,"imprint")]),(("under","threat."),[(1,"Here")]),(("under","threat;"),[(1,"it")]),(("underexposed","image,"),[(1,"in")]),(("undergo","a"),[(1,"process")]),(("underlies","the"),[(1,"photographic")]),(("underlined","by"),[(1,"her")]),(("undermine","the"),[(1,"status")]),(("undermined","by"),[(1,"commercial"),(2,"a")]),(("undermines","any"),[(1,"highbrow")]),(("undermines.","For"),[(1,"instance,")]),(("undermining","the"),[(1,"rhetorical")]),(("underpinnings","of"),[(1,"my")]),(("underpins","and"),[(1,"initiates")]),(("undersea","cocktail"),[(1,"bars")]),(("understand.","To"),[(1,"consider")]),(("understanding","and"),[(1,"the"),(2,"experience")]),(("understanding","in"),[(1,"interpersonal")]),(("understanding","is"),[(1,"precisely")]),(("understanding","itself"),[(1,"is")]),(("understanding","of"),[(1,"modernist")]),(("understanding","racism"),[(1,"as")]),(("understanding","what"),[(1,"it")]),(("understanding","without"),[(1,"the")]),(("understanding,","and"),[(1,"to")]),(("understanding,","since"),[(1,"they"),(2,"all")]),(("understanding.","In"),[(1,"the")]),(("understanding?","Why"),[(1,"should")]),(("understood","as"),[(1,"the"),(2,"supplements"),(2,"everyone")]),(("understood,","or"),[(1,"as")]),(("understood.","But"),[(1,"this")]),(("undesirability","of"),[(1,"its")]),(("undo","our"),[(1,"complicity")]),(("undo","that"),[(1,"possibility.")]),(("undoing","of"),[(1,"the")]),(("undoing:","Richards"),[(1,"collected")]),(("undone","only"),[(1,"insofar")]),(("undoubtedly","addresses"),[(1,"the")]),(("unease","and"),[(1,"the"),(2,"perhaps"),(2,"anxiety")]),(("unease,","since"),[(1,"its")]),(("uneasily","alongside"),[(1,"Amiss")]),(("uneasiness","and"),[(1,"strangeness")]),(("uneasiness","is"),[(1,"founded")]),(("uneasiness.","This"),[(1,"shock")]),(("uneasiness;","and"),[(1,"that")]),(("uneasy"," ")]),(("vastly","indeterminate"),[(1,"and")]),(("vehicle","and"),[(1,"object")]),(("veil","behind"),[(1,"which")]),(("veil","between"),[(1,"blackness")]),(("veil","but"),[(1,"testifying")]),(("veil","can"),[(1,"bear")]),(("veil","covering"),[(1,"(our")]),(("veil","defend"),[(1,"us?")]),(("veil","in"),[(1,"the")]),(("veil","metaphor,"),[(1,"so")]),(("veil","or"),[(1,"unveil"),(2,"ornament")]),(("veil","out"),[(1,"onto")]),(("veil","signifies,"),[(1,"by")]),(("veil","that"),[(1,"is"),(2,"blackness,")]),(("veil)","are"),[(1,"meant")]),(("veil,","to"),[(1,"creep")]),(("veil,","which"),[(1,"is")]),(("veil.","I"),[(1,"had")]),(("veil.","In"),[(1,"reading")]),(("veil.","Making"),[(1,"white")]),(("veiled","(Piper"),[(1,"Critique")]),(("veiled","as"),[(1,"such.")]),(("veiled","by"),[(1,"racism.")]),(("veiled","life"),[(1,"through"),(2,"that")]),(("veiled","meaning."),[(1,"There")]),(("veiled","scenes"),[(1,"to"),(2,"of")]),(("veiled","sight,"),[(1,"or")]),(("veiled","world"),[(1,"names")]),(("veiled,","a"),[(1,"no-thing")]),(("veiled,","and"),[(1,"which")]),(("veiled,","just"),[(1,"as")]),(("veiling","of"),[(1,"the")]),(("veiling/unveiling;","in"),[(1,"this")]),(("veils","its"),[(1,"given")]),(("veils","us"),[(1,"in")]),(("vein,","finally,"),[(1,"the")]),(("vent","to"),[(1,"barely")]),(("ventures,","denying"),[(1,"writers")]),(("verbal","faux"),[(1,"pas")]),(("verge","of"),[(1,"hysterics,")]),(("verifiable","index"),[(1,"of")]),(("verification","exists"),[(2,"for")]),(("verification","of"),[(1,"such")]),(("verification","that"),[(1,"include")]),(("verified","by"),[(1,"subjective")]),(("verify","the"),[(1,"later")]),(("veritable","mutation"),[(1,"of")]),(("veritable","ontology"),[(1,"of")]),(("version","of"),[(1,"ruination,"),(3,"himself"),(2,"encountering")]),(("vertiginous","ground"),[(1,"whose")]),(("very","act"),[(2,"of")]),(("very","anomalous"),[(1,"terms")]),(("very","appetite,"),[(1,"as")]),(("very","condition"),[(2,"of")]),(("very","curious"),[(1,"story")]),(("very"," d")]),(("white","society"),[(1,"does")]),(("white","society."),[(1,"In")]),(("white","subject"),[(1,"to"),(2,"handing")]),(("white","subjectivity"),[(1,"that")]),(("white","unseeing,"),[(1,"itself")]),(("white","viewers"),[(1,"often")]),(("whiteman","windmills"),[(1,"his")]),(("whiteness","as"),[(1,"a")]),(("whiteness","needs"),[(1,"protecting")]),(("whiteness.","Moreover,"),[(1,"the")]),(("whiteness:","all"),[(1,"those")]),(("whiteness;","nothing"),[(1,"permits")]),(("whites","do"),[(1,"not")]),(("whites","from"),[(1,"life")]),(("whites","that"),[(1,"they")]),(("whites.","When"),[(1,"the")]),(("who","(nevertheless)"),[(1,"think")]),(("who","appeals"),[(1,"to")]),(("who","appears"),[(1,"white"),(2,"here")]),(("who","are"),[(2,"different"),(2,"both")]),(("who","cannot"),[(1,"look")]),(("who","disappears,"),[(1,"and")]),(("who","dont"),[(1,"fit")]),(("who","encourages"),[(1,"big")]),(("who","eschews"),[(1,"the")]),(("who","had"),[(1,"been")]),(("who","has"),[(1,"never")]),(("who","have"),[(1,"noted")]),(("who","is"),[(1,"to"),(2,"impolite"),(2,"doing"),(2,"and")]),(("who","looks"),[(1,"indirectly")]),(("who","one"),[(1,"is,")]),(("who","openly"),[(1,"exchanges")]),(("who","orders"),[(1,"the")]),(("who","puts"),[(1,"his")]),(("who","receive"),[(1,"them")]),(("who","received"),[(1,"the")]),(("who","receives/understands"),[(1,"them.")]),(("who","repeatedly"),[(1,"shouts")]),(("who","sees"),[(1,"before")]),(("who","think"),[(1,"that")]),(("who","we"),[(1,"are."),(2,"are")]),(("who","writes"),[(1,"highly")]),(("whole","contributes"),[(1,"to")]),(("whole","of"),[(1,"Pipers")]),(("whole","thing."),[(1,"Disablingly")]),(("whole:","both"),[(1,"are")]),(("wholly","given"),[(1,"over")]),(("wholly","inescapable"),[(1,"sense")]),(("whom","John"),[(1,"is")]),(("whom","he"),[(1,"thinks")]),(("whom","racist"),[(1,"language")]),(("whose","appearance"),[(1,"the")]),(("whose","appetite"),[(1,"ranges")]),(("whose","applicability"),[(1,"cannot")]),(("whose","authority"),[(1,"is")]),(("who erminably."),(2,"and")]),(("within","its"),[(1,"own")]),(("within","reason"),[(1,"itself.")]),(("within","that"),[(1,"grammar")]),(("within","the"),[(1,"visible"),(2,"very"),(2,"situation."),(2,"sighted"),(2,"self-reflexive"),(2,"novel,"),(2,"norms"),(2,"multinational"),(2,"market"),(2,"larger"),(2,"increasingly"),(3,"global"),(3,"field"),(2,"enclosed")]),(("within","their"),[(1,"interlocution.")]),(("within","these"),[(1,"recent")]),(("within","those"),[(1,"works")]),(("within","weeks."),[(1,"As")]),(("without","abstraction,"),[(1,"exchange,")]),(("without","any"),[(1,"standard")]),(("without","being"),[(1,"able")]),(("without","conventionalism."),[(1,"Blackness")]),(("without","designation,"),[(1,"neither")]),(("without","discomfort,"),[(1,"and")]),(("without","ever"),[(1,"seeing"),(2,"presenting,"),(2,"articulating")]),(("without","formal"),[(1,"rules")]),(("without","having"),[(1,"had")]),(("without","it"),[(1,"being")]),(("without","it,"),[(1,"there")]),(("without","knowing"),[(1,"or")]),(("without","learning"),[(1,"how")]),(("without","meaning"),[(1,"to,")]),(("without","money"),[(1,"leering")]),(("without","nor"),[(1,"by")]),(("without","regret."),[(1,"Is")]),(("without","revealing"),[(1,"the")]),(("without","reversion"),[(1,"to")]),(("without","slipping"),[(1,"away")]),(("without","succumbing"),[(1,"to")]),(("without","that"),[(1,"is")]),(("without","the"),[(1,"risk"),(2,"other,"),(2,"mediation")]),(("without","these"),[(1,"categories,")]),(("without","this"),[(1,"other")]),(("without","which"),[(1,"there"),(2,"the")]),(("without,","as"),[(1,"Piper")]),(("without,","however,"),[(1,"responding")]),(("witness","a"),[(1,"break")]),(("witness","is"),[(1,"the")]),(("witness","to"),[(1,"the")]),(("witness.","Piper"),[(1,"acknowledges")]),(("witnessed","a"),[(1,"shift")]),(("woman","(a"),[(1,"common")]),(("woman","accordingly"),[(1,"denotes")]),(("woman","and"),[(1,"temporary")]),(("woman","as"),[(1,"a")]),(("woman","introduced"),[(1,"into")]),(("woman","who"),[(1,
